response.original_title: Red in the Centre: The Nomads at Large
response.overview: In his fourth book, and third documentary, Monte Dwyer explores the Grey Nomads - retirees travelling across the great Australian wilderness. Across his voyage, Monte cooks road kill, finds out who's pinching the toilet paper, and encounters sex, death, and even murder on the road. No story was shirked, and no topic was taboo in the timely expose on the grey nomads.
response.title: Red in the Centre: The Nomads at Large
